summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented: the Service Request form builds the submitted description with a leading `Platform: ${formData.platform}` line, and the provided file summary states the platform dropdown now only shows Xbox, PlayStation, and Other (removing Nintendo and PC options). However, the actual `<SelectItem>` list is not visible in the truncated ServiceRequestPage.tsx diff, so verification of the removed options relies on the summary file.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata for feature requests (AR-1/AR-2) marked as pending in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to adjust the Controller Platform dropdown options on the Service Request form; it does not request changes to project tracking/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified the generated/aggregated frontend file summaries description (including claims about the updated dropdown options).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating documentation/summary artifacts; only functional change to the dropdown/options was requested.
